Title: Creates a live kidney donor follow-up study
Summary: Creates a live kidney donor follow-up study which includes an one thousand dollars per year stipend for participants and provides two thousand dollars for all kidney donors for health-related expenses.
LawCode: Add ยง4311, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating a live kidney donor follow-up study; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
